info.name: MastoDeck
info.description: Changes mastodon.social (and a few other Mastodon sites) to look like Tweetdeck's light theme.
info.additionalInfo:
v0.0 - Quick hack together; More updates to come. Feedback appreciated.
v0.2 - After some missed updates, I have returned to fix MastoDeck. It should now work with the current site. Other versions may be coming soon.
v.03 - Catching up on updates. Rewritten almost entirely and very lazily. Should now work with the current site with no obvious flaws.
v.03.1 - Fixed up some leftovers along with some stuff to accommodate smaller changes to Mastodon's stylesheet.
v.03.2 - Fixed up more leftovers, including Lists ! Also fixes the sudden change of header text not fitting in the header containers.
